Sentencas: Anode-supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) built with La0.58Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3 (-) (delta) (LSCF) as cathode material exhibit a high electrochemical performance at low temperatures.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: However, these LSCF perovskites are chemically incompatible with the YSZ electrolyte, reacting to SrZrO3 which acts as an inhibitor for ion conductivity.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Therefore, an interlayer between electrolyte and cathode is needed to prevent Sr2+ migration towards the electrolyte.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Among the materials we could imagine for this purpose, gadolinium doped ceria, e.g. Ce0.8Gd0.2O2 (- delta) (CGO) shows a good performance.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of these cells depends on the microstructure of the CGO layer.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The deposition method plays an important role for the microstructure of the layer.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The deposition methods screen printing and physical vapor deposition were compared.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Among the physical vapor deposition methods, the magnetron sputtering seems to be the more accurate technology to produce nearly dense layers with efficient Sr2+ retention.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The correlation between the CGO layer microstructure and the performance of the cell and the Sr2+-retention was studied.
Titulo: Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-δ protecting layers manufactured by physical vapor deposition for IT-SOFC
